original_text: For just as through the disobedience of the one man the many were made sinners, so also through the obedience of the one man the many will be made righteous.
korean_text: 한 사람이 순종하지 아니함으로 많은 사람이 죄인 된 것 같이 한 사람이 순종하심으로 많은 사람이 의인이 되리라

sentences.original_text: For just as through the disobedience of the one man

sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 죄인이 되었던 것 같이

sentences.original_text: so also through the obedience of the one man
sentences.korean_translation: 이와 같이 한 사람의 순종으로 말미암아

sentences.original_text: the many will be made righteous
